name: RPG MAKER MV Animation - Energy Disc
name_original: RPG MAKER MV Animation - Energy Disc
description:
Energy Disc Animation for MV ! Comes with a sample project for easy copy/paste !

Designed to be used:
- Without plugins

-With Yanfly Action Sequence plugin

-With additional Projectile plugin

ALLOWED :

-Use in commmercial / non commercial projects

-Use outside of RPG Maker( Unity, etc... )

-Edit files, modify, etc...

NOT ALLOWED:

-Redistribute the files as a standalone.

-Resell the files.
